item.title: Ultra Realistic Truck Physics & Cabin Motion V1.8 1.56 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | October 17, 2025

Ultra Realistic Truck Physics & Cabin Motion V1.8 1.56 ATS

Features:
Fully supports all Trucks
Reworked chassis & suspension physics for all trucks
Ultra-authentic weight transfer, cabin sway, and pitch motion
Fine-tuned damping and spring rates based on real-world truck specs

Unique wet road behavior: realistic grip loss, longer braking distances
Improved driver body physics with natural pitch & sway inside the cab
Compatible with Keyboard, Gamepad, and Steering Wheel + Pedals
Designed for full compatibility with Realistic Brutal Weather
Balanced for realism across city, highway, and mountain driving

Controller Support
Keyboard: Smooth, responsive linearity & sensitivity curve
Gamepad: Full-range steering control with natural damping

Steering Wheel: G29, T300, T500, CSL DD fully supported with FFB realism
Recommended Settings (ETS2 In-Game)

Truck Stability: 0%
Trailer Stability: 10–20%
Suspension Stiffness: 25%
Cabin Suspension: 30%
Cabin Movement: 60–75%
Braking Intensity: 50%
ABS – Anti-Lock Braking System – ON
Uneven Surface Simulation: 100%

Credits: Kass

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Brutal Traffic – V6.6 1.56 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | October 17, 2025

Brutal Traffic – V6.6 1.56 ATS

– Compatible With ETS 1.55.x
– Compatible with all maps and all dlc’s
– Realistic Traffic Jams
– Enhanced Traffic Behaviour
– Compatible with Any AI Traffic Packs
– Lowered Ammount of Trucks and Buses
– Improved Traffic Flow
– Road Traffic Accidents
– Custom Road Events
– Realistic Traffic Density Adjustments for Day and Night
– Smarter Traffic at Intersections and Junctions
– AI Vehicles React to Weather Conditions

Changelog
– Improved spacing, yield, and overtaking rules
– Player and AI interactions are smoother
– Spacing and stop distance checks
– Tweaks Traffic intersections
– Other Tweaks And Improvements

Credits: kass

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Realistic Rain & Water & Thunder Sounds V8.5 1.56 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | October 17, 2025

Realistic Rain & Water & Thunder Sounds V8.5 1.56 ATS

– Compatible To Work With Game Version 1.56.x
– Realistic Lightning Bolts
– Realistic Water
– Realistic Sea, Rivers, Lakes, Beachs etc
– Realistic Thunder Sounds (Over 40 HQ Sounds)
– Realistic Thunder Sounds Inside Cabin & Outside Cabin Of The Truck.
– Realistic Rain Drops And Windshield Effects.
– Realistic Rain
– Realistic Rain Effects
– Realistic Rain Sounds
– Realistic Lightning
– Realistic Lightning Bolts
– Rain Particles/Spray Wheels (Truck & AI Traffic)
– Custom Truck Outside View – Further Zoom Out (Keyboard Key 2) Zoom In / Out (Mouse Wheel)

Changelog
– Improved Rain Drops
– Improved Water Particles
– Other Tweaks And Improvements

Credits: Kass

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
